post:
Fully Managed Virtuozzo powered Linux/Windows VPS Hosting by eUKhost.com. Parallels® Virtuozzo Containers virtualization platform is used for offering these solutions. The technology enables the creation of multiple isolated VPS's on a single physical server hence allowing the sharing of various resources such as hardware, licensing costs and enabling administrators manage the servers efficiently. Every Virtual Private Server acts as a stand-alone server which the user can reboot independently.
